# Hockey Cards Collection - robots.txt
# https://your-card-collection-2026.web.app/

User-agent: *
Allow: /

# Sitemap location
Sitemap: https://your-card-collection-2026.web.app/sitemap.xml

# Crawl-delay for respectful crawling
Crawl-delay: 1

# Disallow admin pages
Disallow: /admin_panel.html
Disallow: /admin_logs.html
Disallow: /update_schedule.html
Disallow: /set_admin_role.html
Disallow: /trigger_manual_update.html
